vote.title: Reappointment of Robert Patterson, President, Marion-Franklin Area Civic Association, 2664 Diane Place, Columbus, Ohio 43207, to serve on the Water and Sewer Advisory Board, with a new term expiration date of September 13, 2024 (resume attached).
